title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Halloween Season Kicks Off in Los Santos
content:
Terror strikes Southern San Andreas as a brood of bloodthirsty characters descend upon GTA Online. Battle a collection of some of the most gruesome adversaries, including Slashers, Clowns, and FIB agents during these next four weeks of nonstop mischief.

As Halloween creeps ever closer, expect new bone-chilling events, paranormal activity, ghastly collectibles, and more throughout the month.
